document.full_text: henrik zetterberg and valtteri filppula scored less than two minutes apart in the third period, and the red wings forcing a decisive seventh game after trailing 3-0 in the pulsating second-round series.
document.title: red wings 3, sharks 1: red wings beat sharks 3-1 to force game 7
lines_and_colors: henrik zetterberg and valtteri filppula scored less than two minutes apart in the third period, and the red wings forcing a decisive seventh game after trailing 3-0 in the pulsating second-round series.
